TopicTitle: With all these new ideas, thing we should call KSP KTP?

Articles.Content: KTP, launching rockets to transport stuff since last month... Sound\'s abit strange to say the least...
I fail to see your logic, care to explain with some context?

Or, base it off the TCP/IP acronym, and call it KSP/TP. Kerbal Space Program / Transportation Program

We could then skin parts to look as if they are made of cardboard rolls.

Is this because of the planes and future vehicles like cars that are not necessarily for space? Because everything in the game up to this point can actually reach space and be used in space. And nothing is really being transported except the kerbals. So no.
With plugins, you can do almost anything.

With plugins, you can do almost anything.

True but why name a game after plugins?

Is this because of the planes and future vehicles like cars that are not necessarily for space? Because everything in the game up to this point can actually reach space and be used in space. And nothing is really being transported except the kerbals. So no.

If it is because of this it would be inane to even suggest the devs amend the name of the game, there is nothing in the game that can\'t be used to help you get into space and beyond.

Furthermore, even if the above was false, the idea is still inane.
I made my comment in jest, but now I\'m seriously considering the cardboard roll idea. I may have to make a whole TP-themed re-skin of parts just to be obnoxious.
